question: How can I make a sourdough starter from scratch and generate an image of a rustic sourdough loaf?

steps.content: How can I make a sourdough starter from scratch and generate an image of a rustic sourdough loaf?

Searching for instructions on making a sourdough starter from scratch.
To make a sourdough starter: Day 1: Mix 1 cup whole wheat flour with 1/2 cup water. Day 2-5: Discard half, add 1 cup all-purpose flour and 1/2 cup water daily.
